para.emphasis: Optional: If a Contested Task is based on Talent only, i.e. it does not rely on the use of a Skill, the GM may wish to double the value of each opponent's Talent, to reflect the fact that the Task depends more on their raw capabilities than on any form of experience.

example.title: Contested Task Resolution Based On Talents
example.screen: A contest of Strength between Joe Blow and Conan could be resolved using: d10-d10* + 2 * Joe Blow's STR >= 2 * Conan's STR
